gmc_hdfs.replicationsimulator

Class DatacentersTopology

  • java.lang.Object
    • gmc_hdfs.replicationsimulator.DatacentersTopology

  • public class DatacentersTopology
extends java.lang.Object
    The topology of the data center network is identified in this class. It contains a list of data center which are connected via links with each intended topology of data centers. The number of data centers and their networking is adjustable.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  DatacentersTopology.State 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DatacentersTopology()
      A storing system of several data centers with arbitrary topology is created.

    • Method Detail

      • getPrimaryNeighbor

        public Datacenter getPrimaryNeighbor(Datacenter datacenter)
        It takes a data center and returns its main neighbor. The function of this method is for the data repetition algorithm with the positioning strategy based on the owner which copies the data in its neighbor.
        Parameters:
        datacenter - input data center
        Returns:
        neighbor of input data center

        It starts data center topology

        return number of data centers in system
        Returns:
        size of data center topology

                             Datacenter source)
        It takes the data center network and a destination data center and returns the bfs survey.
        Parameters:
        inDs - list of data centers
        source - source data center
        Returns:

      • zoning

        public static java.util.List<java.util.List<Datacenter>> zoning(Datacenter d1,
                                                Datacenter d2,
                                                java.util.List<Datacenter> ds)
        It receives a list of data centers and divides them based on the existing two data center to two regions. It is used for the repetition algorithm.
        Parameters:
        d1 - first data center
        d2 - second data center
        ds - list of data centers
        Returns:
        two list of data centers as two zone

      • RoutingTables

        public static int[][] RoutingTables()
        This table should be devised based on the data centers networking and routing algorithms. Here we devise a hypothetical network with ten data centers manually.
        Returns:
        routing table

      • distancMatrix

        public static int[][] distancMatrix()
        This table should be devised based on the data centers networking and routing algorithms. Here we devise a hypothetical network with ten data centers manually.
        Returns:
        a matrix with distance indices between the data centers based on the link.
